function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementation of upper-room uv light or negative air ionization as control measures.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expert installation and post-installation checking of uv fields to ensure no excess uv light is reflected downwards. use of shielded uv fixtures.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Appropriate positioning and installation of modern, shielded uv fixtures. checking of uv fields to ensure no excess uv light is reflected downwards. use of personal uv meters to measure exposures.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of upper-room uv light intervention in waiting rooms, out-patient and emergency departments, and anti-retroviral treatment facilities.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop lower-cost uv fixtures and bulbs suitable for resource-limited settings, explore cost-effective uv technologies.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continual assessment and adaptation of suppression measures to maintain effectiveness","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Addressing privacy concerns through transparent data usage policies, encryption, and user consent","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing other complementary strategies along with school closure","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing clear guidelines for the timing of interventions based on the nature of the epidemic","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research for new intervention methods","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating additional data sources and refining the modeling approach to reduce uncertainty in estimating the effective reproduction number.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve data accuracy and conduct regular reviews of intervention effectiveness","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardize interventions, improve coordination between countries","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict movement restrictions, case isolation, and quarantine measures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce social distancing, testing, and contact tracing","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase testing capacity and prioritize testing for a wider range of suspected cases.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement broader surveillance systems for identifying deaths related to the disease.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough analysis of intervention outcomes within each country and consider specific contextual factors.","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase testing capacity and expand testing to include mild and asymptomatic cases","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coordinate international efforts and information sharing, support countries with delayed intervention measures","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuously monitor and evaluate the impact of interventions, improve data collection and reporting","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict measures such as lockdowns, social distancing, and travel restrictions","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve data collection and testing, validate model assumptions, and enhance surveillance","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting ongoing evaluation of the effectiveness of interventions and adjusting strategies accordingly","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration and sharing of best practices between countries to harmonize intervention strategies","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continual assessment of intervention effectiveness and implementation of additional measures as needed","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collect more data over time to reduce uncertainty","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use advanced statistical methods to analyze intervention effects","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refine the model to incorporate trends in deaths without interventions","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase testing in the community and develop antibody tests for representative population surveys.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continue control measures, develop and implement vaccination strategies.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting sensitivity analysis and focusing on the joint impact of interventions","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of measures to control and prevent further spread of the adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct ongoing monitoring and evaluation of interventions, and adapt strategies based on new data and insights.","category":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transparency in the choice of parameters, validation of parameter choices against multiple sources of evidence, and sensitivity analysis of parameter influence on estimates.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase data availability and refine coefficients to improve reliability of estimates","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use bayesian hierarchical framework to quantify uncertainty and
